scripts.dev: npm exec -- concurrently -n client,server -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev -w @graphwar/client" "npm run dev -w @graphwar/server"
scripts.start: npm exec -- concurrently -n client,server -c cyan,magenta "npm run start -w @graphwar/client" "npm run start -w @graphwar/server"
scripts.build: npm run build -w @graphwar/shared && npm run build -w @graphwar/server && npm run build -w @graphwar/client
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w @graphwar/shared && npm run typecheck -w @graphwar/server && npm run typecheck -w @graphwar/client
